name: MS Graph for Active Directory
description: Connects to Microsoft Active Directory using MS Graph REST API services to support various generic and investigative actions

actions.description: Use supplied credentials to generate a token with MS Graph

actions.verbose: For more information on using the filter_string, select_string and expand_string parameters, refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/query-parameters. By default, only a limited set of properties are returned, to return an alternative property set use $select query parameter.

filter_string.description: Filter string to apply to user listing

select_string.description: Select string to get additional user properties. Separate multiple values with commas

expand_string.description: Expand string to get a resource or collection referenced by a single relationship

actions.description: Reset or set a user's password in a Microsoft AD environment

user_id.description: User ID to change password - can be user principal name or object ID

force_change.description: Force user to change password on next login

actions.description: Invalidate all active refresh tokens for a user in a Microsoft AD environment

user_id.description: User ID to disable tokens of - can be user principal name or object ID
User ID to enable - can be user principal name or object ID
User ID to disable - can be user principal name or object ID

actions.description: List devices for a specified user
actions.verbose: By default, only a limited set of properties are returned, to return an alternative property set use $select query parameter. For more information on using the select_string parameter, refer to this documentation.

user_id.description: User ID - can be user principal name or object ID

select_string.description: Select string to get additional user properties. Separate multiple values with commas

example_values: Successfully retrieved owned devices for user test@user.test.com
Status: Successfully retrieved owned devices for user test@user.test.com

actions.description: List attributes for all or a specified user

user_id.description: User ID - can be user principal name or object ID

select_string.description: Select string to get additional user properties. Separate multiple values with commas

expand_string.description: Expand string to get a resource or collection referenced by a single relationship
